Html:
Hi,

I need to override the display of routes. ( DrawRoutes(Graphics g))

To do so I've created a inheritated class of GMapOverlay.
But since my class is not part of the GMap.net assembly, I can't get the LocalPoints since they are internal.

I'd rather not alter the assembly, since I want to keep up with changes.

Is there a simple way to get to do what I want, without modifying the GMap.net assembly ?

Thanks

Great.

Thanks a lot. And congratulations for that tremendous work.
